title: THIS is better - PowerColor Red Devil 7900 XTX
description: Thanks to Shopify for sponsoring the unboxing the 7900 XTX GPU! Start your own business with Shopify, where you can try it for 14 days free at   AMD's new 7900 XTX GPUs are looking to be a good alternative to the NVIDIA RTX 4080 in terms of value-to-performance. Let's put it to the test and see if it's enough to dethrone team green's offerings.  Buy a PowerColor Red Devil 7900 XTX:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 AMD vs. NVIDIA 0:35 Time to unbox 1:17 Accessories 3:17 Testbench 5:10 Shopify! 6:23 Gaming
